description: Dashboard for spring boot services. Displays standard spring metrics, jvm metrics, important data from kubernetes. Grafana 10+. Up-to-date original version is here https://github.lmru.tech/adeo/lmru--sv-grafana-dashboards/

targets.expr: sum by (method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception=~"[Nn]one", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) / sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception=~"[Nn]one", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$pod",namespace=~"$namespace", service="$app",  exception=~"[Nn]one", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) by (le, uri))

panels.description: Actually, query works with 'outcome' attribute: [SUCCESS, CLIENT_ERROR, SERVER_ERROR]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SUCCESS", }[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", }[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR", }[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", }[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SERVER_ERROR", }[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", }[5m])) by (service))

panels.title: Response Status Groups 2xx / 4xx / 5xx [5m]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", }[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", }[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome!="SUCCESS"}[5m])) by (method, uri) / (sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (method, uri)) > 0
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) > 0
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) > 0
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", exception!~"[Nn]one"}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, uri))
sum by (method, uri) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", k8s_cluster=~"payment|sirius-a"}[1m]))

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[1m])) / sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[1m]))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SUCCESS"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status="IO_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))) > 0
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) > 0
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[5m])) > 0

1.text: Some containers not running or ready

targets.expr:
min by (pod) (
  max(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller_name="$app"}) by(pod)
  * on (pod) group_right()
  (
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (label_replace(min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]), "phase", "Ready", "", "")) == 1) * 0 + 0
    )
    or on(pod)
    (
      (min by (pod, phase) (min_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) == 1) * 0
      + on(phase) group_left()
      (
        label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Unknown", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Failed", "", "") or
        label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Succeeded", "", "")
      )
    )
  )  
)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller_name="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m])) /  sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m]))
sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!="unknown", result!="success"}[5m]))

sum by (messaging_source_name) (irate(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) /  sum by (messaging_source_name) (irate(spring_kafka_listener_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))
sum by (error, messaging_source_name) (increase(spring_kafka_template_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", error!="none"}[1m]))

sum by (messaging_destination_name, spring_kafka_template_name) (irate(spring_kafka_template_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) / sum by (messaging_destination_name, spring_kafka_template_name) (irate(spring_kafka_template_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))
sum by (error, messaging_destination_name, spring_kafka_template_name) (increase(spring_kafka_template_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", error!="none"}[1m]))

sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m])) / sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m]))
sum by (repository, method, exception) (increase(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception!~"[Nn]one"}[5m]))

sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", result="hit"}[5m])) by (cache) / sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (cache)

((vector(-1) and on() (executor_pool_max_threads{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name="$spring_task_executor"} == 2147483647)) or on() executor_pool_max_threads{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name="$spring_task_executor"})

((vector(-1) and on() (executor_queue_remaining_tasks{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name="$spring_task_executor"} == 2147483647)) or on() executor_queue_remaining_tasks{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name="$spring_task_executor"})

matcher.options: total (press shift + left click to hide)
total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (code_function,k8s_cluster) (irate(tasks_scheduled_execution_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m])) / sum by (code_function,k8s_cluster) (irate(tasks_scheduled_execution_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m]))
sum by (code_function, exception) (increase(tasks_scheduled_execution_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="ERROR"}[5m]))

sum by (method, uri, k8s_cluster) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health|prometheus)"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health|prometheus)"}[5m]))

sum by (method, uri, status, pod, k8s_cluster) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome!="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health|prometheus)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Actuator Response Statuses 4xx/5xx by (method, path, status, pod) [5m]

targets.expr: sum by (area, k8s_cluster) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
sum by (area, k8s_cluster) (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="heap", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
sum by (area, k8s_cluster) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
sum by (area, k8s_cluster) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
sum by (area, k8s_cluster) (jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="nonheap", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}
jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}
jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (command) (irate(mongodb_driver_commands_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m])) / sum by (command) (irate(mongodb_driver_commands_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m]))

sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"} [1m])) / sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))

sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) / sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))

sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"} [1m])) / sum by (pod) (irate(hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pool=~"$hikaricp", pod=~"$pod"}[1m]))

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (task) (irate(dbscheduler_task_duration_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m])) / sum by (task) (irate(dbscheduler_task_duration_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m]))

sum(increase(dbscheduler_task_completions_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", result="ok"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(dbscheduler_task_completions_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(dbscheduler_task_completions_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", result="failed"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(dbscheduler_task_completions_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (service))

title: Spring Boot + K8S Info 2.0 Stage
